title: Urgent hiring: SEO Expert
job_overview:
Are you ready to elevate your SEO skills and work alongside industry leaders? BrandLume is seeking an SEO Marketing Expert to join our team of digital marketing enthusiasts. Together, we'll deliver exceptional results while meeting clients' demands and deadlines.


Job responsibilities:
Execute tests, collect and analyze data and results, identify trends and insights in order to achieve maximum ROI in paid search campaigns
Track, report, and analyze website analytics and PPC initiatives and campaigns
Conduct SEO audit Manage campaign expenses, staying on budget, estimating monthly costs and reconciling discrepancies.
Optimize copy and landing pages for search engine marketing
Perform ongoing keyword discovery, expansion and optimization
Research and implement search engine optimization recommendations
Research and analyze competitor advertising links
Develop and implement link building strategy
Work with the development team to ensure SEO best practices are properly implemented on newly developed code
Work with editorial and marketing teams to drive SEO in content creation and content programming
Recommend changes to website architecture, content, linking and other factors to improve SEO positions for target keywords

Requirements:
Must be able to work 9 AM â€“ 5 PM EST

At least 3 years of experience as an SEO Specialist
Very strong understanding of on-page and off-page SEO
Experience working in a fast-paced SEO or digital marketing agency
Has handled multiple accounts simultaneously
Proficient in SEMrush and performing detailed SEO audits
Skilled in keyword research, understanding of search engine algorithms, and ranking methods
Experience with meeting clients and presenting performance reports, audits, and strategic recommendations
Ability to provide custom SEO audits that go beyond tool-generated reports
Experience managing, leading, and executing SEO to-dos and deliverables based on strategy
Excellent command of the English language, both written and verbal
Knowledge of PPC marketing and Google Analytics is a plus



To apply, fill out this form: Upgrade to see actual info


We are filling this position immediately!

Looking forward to receiving your application!
